title: Paul Hogan
summary: Paul Hogan AM (born 8 October 1939) is an Australian actor, comedian, film producer, television presenter and writer. He was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Original Screenplay and won the Golden Globe Award for Best Actor â€“ Motion Picture Musical or Comedy for his performance as outback adventurer Michael "Crocodile" Dundee in Crocodile Dundee (1986), the first in the Crocodile Dundee film series.
